Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48622 affecting package gdk-pixbuf2 for versions less than 2.42.10-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-48622 affecting package gdk-pixbuf2 for versions less than 2.42.10-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gdk-pixbuf2 is earlier than 2.42.10-1, affected by CVE-2022-48622
